messages.subject: Ive Been Blogging
messages.msgSnippet: So im over a mnth into Blogging and LOVE it!  Just wanted to share my passion of late, I have to share, tonight I was blogging and Bethany asked what  I was
messages.messageBody:
So im over a mnth into Blogging and LOVE it! Just wanted to share my
passion of late, I have to share, tonight I was blogging and Bethany asked what I
was doing I said Blogging and she looked at me and said MOM I love that you
love doing that, I love seeing you smile as you type... I felt great setting
that example!!

Chrissy in IL

www.homeschoolblogger.com/chrissyland


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
